description: This file appears to be an ESLint configuration file written in JavaScript using ECMAScript modules. It sets up linting rules and configurations, including integration with TypeScript ESLint, Playwright plugin, and Prettier. It specifies ignore patterns, extends recommended configs, and applies specific rules for files with extensions like .ts, .tsx, .js, .mjs, and .cjs.

methods.name: default
methods.description: Exports an ESLint configuration array that includes ignore patterns, recommended ESLint and plugin configurations, specific rules for test files, and Prettier configuration.
